definition: Arcturus (brightest star in the constellation Boötes 牧伕座|牧夫座[Mu4 fu1 zuo4])
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale

sentences.english: Near the image center is the bright star Arcturus .
sentences.chinese: 在影像中央附近是明亮的大角星。

sentences.english: The Arcturians know yet another type of system that is founded upon hydrogen or is hydrogen-based.
sentences.chinese: 大角星人知道另一種系統，構建在氫或氫基之上。

sentences.english: With dark shies you will notice the reddish color of Arcturus.
sentences.chinese: 當夜幕降臨時，你會注意到那顆淡紅色的大角星。

sentences.english: This blue-white gem appears to the southwest (lower left) of Arcturus.
sentences.chinese: 這個藍白寶石一樣的星星出現在大角星的西南方向。

definition: Rigel (star)/lit. seventh star of the Three Stars Chinese constellation
Antares, the brightest star in Scorpio 天蠍座|天蝎座[Tian1 xie1 zuo4]
Virgo (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
